trait.name: Ability Score Increase
trait.text: You may increase one ability score by 2 and another by 1, or three different ability scores by 1.

trait.name: Desert Adaptation
trait.text: You are acclimated to hot and arid environments. You can go without water for up to 24 hours without suffering exhaustion, and you have advantage on saving throws against extreme heat.

trait.name: Desert Warrior
trait.text: You have proficiency in the scimitar and shortbow.

trait.name: Warrior's Endurance
trait.text: When you take the Dodge action, you can also make a weapon attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Custom made for the Zelda universe.
